product.longDescription:
The 360° line design gives a modern and dynamic touch to this lightweight Spinner Carry-On, while practical features like a water-repellent zipper make sure you can travel in comfort.

• Extremely lightweight, weighing in at only 2kgs (4.4 lb)!
• Water-repellent coated zipper helps to protect your belongings from rain and moisture.
• Designed to fit in the overhead compartment on most flights. *Carry-on standards vary by airline - always check with your airline before flying.
• Mounted 3-digit TSA-approved lock provides added security for your belongings.
• Dual Spinner wheels make it easy to navigate narrow airplane aisles as well as over a variety of surfaces.
• Multi-stage pull handle adjusts for a more comfortable grip.
• Retracting top carry-handle stays flush to the case to protect against damage.
• Interior features a zipped divider with mesh pocket and elastic cross-ribbons in both the top and bottom compartments. Also has a playful lining with geometric print.
• Constructed of 100% polypropylene offering extreme durability with a texture that reduces the visibility of scratches.
• Feel secure with a limited 10 year Warranty

• Weight: 4.4 lbs.

Body Dimensions: 18.5" x 14.8" x 7.5"
Overall Dimensions: 21.5" x 15.5" x 10.3"
product.shortDescription: With Airconic, every adventure becomes iconic. Our lightest carry-on yet at just 4.4 lbs, Airconic gives you the freedom to pack it all without feeling weighed down. Designed for spontaneity, this spinner blends style with durability making it the ultimate travel companion for 1-3 day trips.

tooltip: Suitcase shell material is made of injection molded polyproplyene, a highly impact-resistant plastic that is strong, lightweight, flexible, and moisture resistant.
The total dimensions of the case including handles and wheels
The dimensions of the case without handles or wheels; packing dimensions
To learn more about TSA locks and how to set the lock please visit our lock instructions page
Warranty covers manufacturing defects. For more information please visit our warranty page
